          <title>
            <string language="fi">Asiakas painaa tuotenäppäintä</string>
            <string language="en">Customer presses the product button</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunde betätigt die Produkttaste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le client appuie sur le bouton de produit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cliente pressiona a tecla do produto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cliente preme il tasto del prodotto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πελάτης πατά το κουμπί προϊόντων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cliente presiona el botón del producto</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Viivapiirros asiakkaasta painamassa tuotenäppäintä.</string>
            <string language="en">Line drawing of a customer pressing the product button.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">kauppa</string>
            <string language="fi">tuotenäppäin</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen Sie Zeichnung eines Kunden, der die 
Produkttaste betätigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayez le schéma d'un client appuyant sur le 
bouton de produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alinhe o desenho de um cliente que pressiona a 
tecla do produto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allinei l'illustrazione di un cliente che preme il
tasto del prodotto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο γραμμών ενός πελάτη που πατά το κουμπί 
προϊόντων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alinee el gráfico de un cliente que presiona el 
botón del producto.</string>
          </description>
